rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a spacious foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the primary entrance on the north for auspicious energy flow.
Open concept living space with large windows and natural light, Scandinavian design simplicity and functionality.
Adjacent to the living room with ample seating space and elegant minimalistic furniture.
Fully equipped Scandinavian kitchen with modern appliances, open layout for social interaction.
Luxury master suite with an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet and north-facing windows to align with Vastu principles.
Spacious guest room designed for comfort with ample storage.
Quiet study or home office space featuring Scandinavian design aesthetics and functional lighting.
Dedicated entertainment room with soundproof walls, state-of-the-art audiovisual systems, and seating arrangements that provide an immersive experience.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring the positive flow of energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows to let in natural light while maintaining privacy.
Balcony offering outdoor access and fresh air for the living space.

rooms.description: Continuation of the luxury suite with expansive north-facing windows for natural light.
Three guest bedrooms arranged in a layout that maximizes space and privacy.
Modern bathroom amenities for master bedroom suite.
Multipurpose area that can be used as a family room or extra guest space.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting both floors with safety and aesthetic appeal.
Additional balconies providing outdoor views and natural ventilation.
